definition: disappointed
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)

sentences.english: Jackie see the exit game, her Evans is also feel despaired.
sentences.chinese: 杰姬看埃利退出游戏，她也很败兴。

sentences.english: Later, another teacher invited him to Syracuse, the result would be disappointed and go.
sentences.chinese: 后来老师再次邀请他去叙拉古，结果仍是败兴而归。

sentences.english: He's such a wet blanket, always talking about rising prices and unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 他这个败兴的人，只会谈物价上涨和失业。
